ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: It isnt sad, its real life. These things happen every day, both in-game and outside. If you are a core roleplayer just think of it as he had a rich uncle. If
ygData.messageBody:
It isnt sad, its real life. These things happen every day, both in-game and
outside. If you are a core roleplayer just think of it as he had a rich
uncle. If not well, you would do it yourself if you had a chance. Simply
nothing to moan about.

Envy wont help you one bit. Most likely hes gone through the "i killed 2000
rats and then 2000 orc pawns" with another character and its not appealing
to do it again.

/Alex

-----Original Message-----
From: LeSamLam@... [mailto:LeSamLam@...]
Sent: den 23 maj 2001 15:01
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem


You know what's sad, my 24 enchanter ran into a level 6 chanter last
night...he was decked out FAR better than I was. I need some PP!

Lena
<< >
> I am still new to EQ I am looking for ways to earn money. I read post
> were people half my lvl (Bard lvl 6) have all this $. I am open to
> suggestions.
> >>
